name: Into the Forest
description:
Type the correct Byword (with right Punctuation and Capitalization) to win past the Evils and recover your Treasure. Type one Error and a Monster will chase you all the way back, or off the Path.

Click the Fox to escape a pursuing Monster, and to learn your Bywords (this is also where your Progress is saved).

Keep your Mind sharp!

All the Images used are from Pixabay, except for the Hedgehog's Gifts and your Treasure. The Gifts were made by my Brother Nathaniel.

God be with you!

Your Servant, Patrick.

Support the Guy who took your Spellchecker on Patreon.
